QuestData.Title: A Spark of Light
QuestData.Description:
Gorgoa is a protean force fueled by souls that trickle in from many worlds. They wash in from the head of the river, a place they have named the Crucible of the Damned.
The Jailer's unblinking eyes patrol the river and watch for souls who attempt escape.
Blind the eyes that find them. Close them for good.
Take this and do what must be done.
QuestData.RewardText: Well done, Maw Walker. The Jailer's eyes are dangerous, indeed.
